ingredients.content: ½ vanilla bean, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place sugar and vanilla bean into mixing bowl and mill <b>25 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water and salt and reduce <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid.

Add cocoa powder and reduce for a further <b>4 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>, placing simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid. Transfer into a bottle or small jug and serve hot or cold.
